name: Smile
title: Smile
description: These performances tackle the surface of a smile, especially in relation to the political pragmatism and conservatism of mainstream queer culture.

carouselOne.subtext:
Performed at the **SUPERNOVA Performance Art Festival**, Rosslyn, VA, 2013
*Shut Up and Smile* [Performance - Special Projects]
Performance, handmade costume and video projection
Curated by Eames Armstrong
Photo and video documentation credit: Josh Vettivelu
